original_text: He was foreknown before the foundation of the world but was made manifest in the last times for the sake of you
korean_text: 그는 창세 전부터 미리 알린 바 되신 이나 이 말세에 너희를 위하여 나타내신 바 되었으니

sentences.original_text: He was foreknown before the foundation of the world
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 세상의 기초가 놓이기 전에 미리 알려지셨습니다

sentences.original_text: but was made manifest in the last times for the sake of you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 마지막 때에 너희를 위해 나타나셨습니다
